results.title: Simvastatin acutely reduces myocardial reperfusion injury in vivo by activating the phosphatidylinositide 3-kinase/Akt pathway.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ acutely reduces @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Reperfusion_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015428 @@@myocardial reperfusion injury@@@ in vivo by activating the phosphatidylinositide 3-kinase/@GENE_AKT1 @GENE_24185 @@@Akt@@@ pathway.

citations.NLM: Wolfrum S, Dendorfer A, Schutt M, Weidtmann B, Heep A, Tempel K, Klein HH, Dominiak P, Richardt G. Simvastatin acutely reduces myocardial reperfusion injury in vivo by activating the phosphatidylinositide 3-kinase/Akt pathway. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 2004 Sep;44(3):348-55. PMID: 15475833

results.title: Pleiotropic effects of simvastatin are associated with mitigation of apoptotic component of cell death upon lethal myocardial reperfusion-induced injury.
